sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import EnhancedLoading from '../components/EnhancedLoading'; import EnhancedSearchBar from '../components/EnhancedSearchBar'; import EnhancedNotification from '../components/EnhancedNotification'; import DataVisualization from '../components/DataVisualization'; import AccessibilityFeatures from '../components/AccessibilityFeatures'; const Demo = () => { const [loadingType, setLoadingType] = useState('spinner'); const [loadingSize, setLoadingSize] = useState('medium'); const [showNotification, setShowNotification] = useState(false); const [notificationType, setNotificationType] = useState('success'); const chartData = [ { label: 'Infrastructure', value: 35 }, { label: 'Public Safety', value: 25 }, { label: 'Environment', value: 20 }, { label: 'Education', value: 15 }, { label: 'Healthcare', value: 5 } ]; const statsData = [ { title: 'Active Users', value: '10,000+', change: '+15%', changeType: 'positive', icon: '👥', description: 'Bangladeshi citizens' }, { title: 'Issues Resolved', value: '500+', change: '+25%', changeType: 'positive', icon: '✅', description: 'Community problems fixed' }, { title: 'Districts Covered', value: '64', change: '100%', changeType: 'positive', icon: '🗺️', description: 'All of Bangladesh' }, { title: 'Free Service', value: '100%', change: 'Always', changeType: 'positive', icon: '💚', description: 'For all citizens' } ]; const progressData = [ { progress: 75, label: 'Infrastructure' }, { progress: 60, label: 'Public Safety' }, { progress: 90, label: 'Environment' } ]; const tableData = [ { id: 1, title: 'Street Light Repair', status: 'In Progress', priority: 'High', location: 'Dhaka' }, { id: 2, title: 'Road Maintenance', status: 'Pending', priority: 'Medium', location: 'Chittagong' }, { id: 3, title: 'Water Supply Issue', status: 'Resolved', priority: 'Urgent', location: 'Sylhet' }, { id: 4, title: 'Garbage Collection', status: 'Assigned', priority: 'Low', location: 'Rajshahi' } ]; const tableColumns = [ { key: 'id', label: 'ID' }, { key: 'title', label: 'Title' }, { key: 'status', label: 'Status' }, { key: 'priority', label: 'Priority' }, { key: 'location', label: 'Location' } ]; const handleSearch = (query, filters) => { console.log('Search:', query, 'Filters:', filters); }; const showNotificationDemo = (type) => { setNotificationType(type); setShowNotification(true); setTimeout(() => setShowNotification(false), 5000); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Enhanced Components Demo

Showcasing the improved CivicAid website features

{/* Accessibility Features */}

♿ Accessibility Features

{/* Enhanced Loading Components */}

🔄 Enhanced Loading States

Loading Types

{['spinner', 'dots', 'pulse', 'skeleton', 'ring'].map(type => (
{type}
))}

Loading Sizes

{['small', 'medium', 'large', 'xlarge'].map(size => (
{size}
))}
{/* Enhanced Search Bar */}

🔍 Enhanced Search & Filtering

{/* Data Visualization */}

Pie Chart

Bar Chart

Statistics Cards

Progress Rings

{/* Enhanced Notifications */}

🔔 Enhanced Notifications

{showNotification && ( setShowNotification(false)} /> )}
{/* Interactive Features */}

🎯 Interactive Features

Hover Effects

320px+

768px+

1024px+

1280px+
{/* Summary */}

🎉 Enhanced CivicAid Website

The CivicAid website has been transformed with modern design, enhanced user experience, comprehensive accessibility features, and improved performance. All components are now interactive, responsive, and user-friendly.

✨ Enhanced UX

  • • Modern animations
  • • Interactive elements
  • • Smooth transitions
  • • Loading states

♿ Accessibility

  • • WCAG 2.1 AA compliant
  • • High contrast mode
  • • Font size controls
  • • Screen reader support

📱 Responsive

  • • Mobile-first design
  • • Touch-friendly interface
  • • Adaptive layouts
  • • Performance optimized
); }; export default Demo;
